channel.title: Eco | PVP | PKing | Based 667 Server! ~STAFF NEEDED~
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt][u][b]THIS SERVER IS 100% CREDITED TOWARDS Jet Kai! I am releasing this server so people can play on it, while I edit it and remold it into what my server shall become! [/b][/u][/size][/center]
[center][size=18pt][b]THIS IS THE OLD SPAWNSCAPE![/b][/size][/center]
[center][size=14pt][b]BlitzScape is an awesome starting out server. Looking for growth and populations. [color=yellow][u]~~NEED STAFF ~~[/u][/color] [u][color=red][u][b][b]There are no staff members as of now! All have been demoted and must apply again just as before! Positions are open! & Needed, [/b][/b][/u][/color][/u] First 5 to join have the highest chance of becoming a fellow staff member, a small interview will be conducted. Web client is being worked on as we speak, It is taking more time than expected! All credit goes to Tyreatta-Scape for the base model, and allowing us to change as we go on a Server base.[/b][/size][/center]
[center][size=24pt][u][b]We have many features:[/b][/u][/size][/center]
[center][size=12pt][b]- Teleport Interface
- Skull PvP Lvling System
- Starter Interface
- Custom Mage Arena Zone (No Range)
- Thieving
- Shops
- PvP
- Spawning/Selling
- Dicing
- Cash/Shard Eco
- Account Logs
- Commands
- Magic
- Custom Portals at Home
- Custom Multi Donator Zone
- Donator Ranks
- Custom Names
- Custom Levels
- Custom Hit Splat (600+ Damage)
- Fixed max cash stack resetting at 2147m
- Godsword Specs
- Safe PvP at Home
- Unsafe PvP in other areas
- Custom Auto Restart Messages
- Server Messages
- Donation System
- Voting System
- MySQL
- ScanIP command
- Trading[/b][/size][/center]
[center][URL=http://s498.photobucket.com/user/Killacam3160_2008/media/667/Untitled.png.html][IMG]http://i498.photobucket.com/albums/rr342/Killacam3160_2008/667/Untitled.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s498.photobucket.com/user/Killacam3160_2008/media/667/dz1_zps93ac9fb9.png.html][IMG]http://i498.photobucket.com/albums/rr342/Killacam3160_2008/667/dz1_zps93ac9fb9.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s498.photobucket.com/user/Killacam3160_2008/media/667/33kd9x4.jpg.png.html][IMG]http://i498.photobucket.com/albums/rr342/Killacam3160_2008/667/33kd9x4.jpg.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s498.photobucket.com/user/Killacam3160_2008/media/667/castle-wars_zpsb91b8512.png.html][IMG]http://i498.photobucket.com/albums/rr342/Killacam3160_2008/667/castle-wars_zpsb91b8512.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s498.photobucket.com/user/Killacam3160_2008/media/667/dz2_zps502011de.png.html][IMG]http://i498.photobucket.com/albums/rr342/Killacam3160_2008/667/dz2_zps502011de.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s498.photobucket.com/user/Killacam3160_2008/media/667/2_zps9deed267.png.html][IMG]http://i498.photobucket.com/albums/rr342/Killacam3160_2008/667/2_zps9deed267.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s498.photobucket.com/user/Killacam3160_2008/media/667/pets_zps804202ec.png.html][IMG]http://i498.photobucket.com/albums/rr342/Killacam3160_2008/667/pets_zps804202ec.png[/img][/URL] [URL=http://s498.photobucket.com/user/Killacam3160_2008/media/667/comp_zps4a873ae7.png.html][IMG]http://i498.photobucket.com/albums/rr342/Killacam3160_2008/667/comp_zps4a873ae7.png[/img][/URL][/center]
[center][font=verdana][size=36pt][u][b]Download Link Here! Please LMK If LINK IS DOWN OR CLIENT ISN'T WORKING![/b][/u][/size][/font][/center] [center][size=24pt][u][b]THIS IS A .BAT FILE! IF THE SERVER DOESNT RUN FOR YOU ! CLICK EDIT ON THE RUN.BAT! LOCATE YOUR LATEST JDK VERSION AND REPLACE IT IN THE STRING SEEN!![/b][/u][/size][/center] [center]https://www.dropbox.com/s/9xtg520xsqwgisd/BlitzScape%20PVP%20%28SpawnScape%29.rar?dl=0[/center]

item.title: Eco | PVP | PKing | Based 667 Server! ~STAFF NEEDED~
item.dc:creator: @Blitzx Blitzx
item.description:
@Blitzx wrote:

Yes, 100% permission, this is NOT the final product of my serer, I opened it up after launch to allow players to help with bugs and to add things to this server… I am by no means keeping this server the way it is, it’s just to make a staff list and a helping team to begin building and working together… So PLEASE, no more negative feedback, if you do not want to play, pass by. That’s all I ask.

-Blitz

Read full topic
